content.question: Give support for the claim that the cells located in the tip of the plant shoot detect the light by comparing the results from treatment group I with the results from treatment group II and treatment group III.

frqParts.text: Give support for the claim that the cells located in the tip of the plant shoot detect the light by comparing the results from treatment group I with the results from treatment group II and treatment group III.

skill.text: 5.D: Use data to evaluate a hypothesis or prediction, including rejecting or failing to reject the null hypothesis.
